remarks: Express the predicate ` F ` converges to ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
clim2.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
clim2.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
clim2.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
clim2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) $.
clim2c.5 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
clim2c.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) $.
clim2c $p |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> A <-> A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( abs ` ( B - A ) ) < x ) ) $.
$d A j k x $.
$d F j k x $.
$d M j $.
$d Z j k $.
$d j k ph x $.
